          <title>
            <string language="en">Spectrum of light from the Sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spektrum des Lichtes von der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Spectre de lumière du soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Spectrum da luz do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spettro di luce dal sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάσμα του φωτός από τον ήλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espectro de la luz del sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows the spectrum of light from the Sun, from the infra-red, visible and ultraviolet region.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infra-red</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultraviolet</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Spektrum des Lichtes 
von der Sonne, von der Infrarot-, sichtbaren und ultravioletten 
Region.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre le spectre de la lumière du 
soleil, de la région infrarouge, visible et ultra-violette.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra o spectrum da luz do sol, da 
região infravermelha, visível e ultravioleta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra lo spettro di luce dal sole,
dalla regione infrarossa, visibile ed ultravioletta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός εμφανίζει το φάσμα του φωτός από 
ήλιος, από την υπέρυθρη, ορατή και υπεριώδη περιοχή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra el espectro de la luz del 
sol, de la región infrarroja, visible y ultravioleta.</string>
          </description>
